original_title: Glad Christmas Tidings Featuring David Archuleta
overview: During December 2010, the Mormon Tabernacle Choir, Orchestra at Temple Square, and Bells on Temple Square were joined by singing sensation David Archuleta and world-renowned actor Michael York in a series of concerts that gloried in the old-time pioneer Christmases of centuries past.

production_companies.name: The Church of Jesus-Christ of Latter-Day Saints

tagline: Christmas with the Mormon Tabernacle Choir and Orchestra at Temple Square
title: Glad Christmas Tidings Featuring David Archuleta
